src_original: sahacittotpādācca sarvasattvānāṃ dakṣiṇīyabhūto bhavati gurubhūtaḥ puṇyakṣetraṃ pitṛkalpaḥ prajānāmavyābādhyasya ca puṇyasya parigrahaṃ karoti

yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaścakravarti-dviguṇonārakṣeṇārakṣito bhavati /  yasminnārakṣe sadā pratyupasthite na śaknuvanti suptamattapramattasyāpi vyāḍā vā yakṣā vā amanuṣyā vā naivāsikā vā viheṭhāṃ kartum /
asiddhānyapi ca tadanya hastagatāni sattvānāmītyupadravopasargasaṃśamakāni mantrapadāni vidyāpadāni taddhastagatāni sidhyanti /

adhikena ca kṣāntisauratyena samanvāgato bhavati /  parata-upatāpasahaḥ aparopatāpī ca /  pareṇāpi ca paramupatāpyamānamupalabhyātyartha bādhyate /  krodherṣyāśāṭhyamrakṣādayaścāsyopakleśāhatavegā mandāyamānāḥ kadācitsamudācarantyāśu ca vigacchanti /  yatra ca grāmakṣetre prativasati tasmin bhayabhairavadurbhikṣadoṣā amanuṣyakṛtāścopadravā anutpannāśca notpadyante utpannāśca vyupaśāmyanti
sa cetpunaḥ sa prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvaḥ ekadā (Dutt 14)  narakeṣvapāyabhūmāvupapadyate sa bhūyasyā mātrayā āśutaraṃ ca mucyate narakebhyaḥ /
